steps: step 7: Click on link goToCart (GoToCart2) -> Navigate to page '/cart'
step 8: Click on button ProceedToCheckout -> Navigate to page 'checkout/info'
step 11: Enter input value in input Email
step 12: Click on button ContinueToShipping -> Navigate to page 'checkout/shipping-address'
step 16: Enter input value in input FirstName
step 19: Enter input value in input LastName
step 22: Enter input value in input Address
step 25: Enter input value in input ZipCode
step 28: Enter input value in input ShippingCity
step 31: Enter input value in input State
step 33: Enter input value in input Phone
step 35: Click on div ContinueToPayment -> Navigate to page 'checkout/payment'
step 36: Click on span CompleteOrder -> Navigate to page 'thank-you/*'
step 37: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint
